metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29338 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description: Integer Overflow in OpenJPEG v2.4.0 allows remote attackers to crash theapplication, causing a Denial of Service (DoS). This occurs when theattacker uses the command line option "-ImgDir" on a directory thatcontains 1048576 files.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
blender package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
texmaker package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
